RegisterExpert.Title: Join our awesome experts team
RegisterExpert.ExpertTypeTitle: Choose which type/s of expert you want to become:
RegisterExpert.Why: Why do you want to be a part of Smart Valley?

RegisterExpert.CvNotify: The main thing after your name and motivation

RegisterExpert.DocumentNotify: It’s a real job and we need one of this document to hire you.

RegisterExpert.UploadNotify: Yeah, sounds complicated, but we want to be sure that your document wasn't stolen.
